42 #include "Teuchos_StringToIntMap.hpp"
43 
44 namespace Teuchos {
45 
46 StringToIntMap::StringToIntMap(
47  const std::string& defaultGroupName_in, int n, const char* strings[]
48  ) : defaultGroupName_(defaultGroupName_in)
49 {
50  typedef map_t::value_type val_t;
51  for( int i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
52  const bool unique = map_.insert( val_t( strings[i], i ) ).second;
53  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
54  !unique, AlreadyExists
55  ,"Teuchos::StringToIntMap::StringToIntMap(...): "
56  << "Error, the std::string \"" << strings[i] << "\" is a duplicate for "
57  << defaultGroupName_ );
58  }
59 }
60 
61 int StringToIntMap::get( const std::string& option, const std::string& groupName ) const
62 {
63  map_t::const_iterator itr = map_.find( option );
64  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
65  itr == map_.end(), DoesNotExist
66  ,"Teuchos::StringToIntMap:::get(\""<<option<<"\",...): "
67  << "Error, the std::string \"" << option << "\" is not recongnised for "
68  << ( groupName.length() ? groupName : defaultGroupName_ )
69  << "; valid selections include " << this->validSelections() << "."
70  );
71  return (*itr).second;
72 }
73 
74 // private
75 
76 std::string StringToIntMap::validSelections() const
77 {
78  std::ostringstream oss;
79  oss << "{";
80  map_t::const_iterator itr = map_.begin();
81  for( int i = 0; itr != map_.end(); ++itr, ++i ) {
82  if(i > 0)
83  oss << ",";
84  oss << "\""<<itr->first<<"\":"<<itr->second;
85  }
86  oss << "}";
87  return oss.str();
88 }
89 
90 } // end namespace Teuchos
TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION
#define TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(throw_exception_test, Exception, msg)
Macro for throwing an exception with breakpointing to ease debugging.
